name: boastfulness
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a way of talking in which you praise yourself and what you have done: He speaks with honesty rather than boastfulness. There is a fine line between admirable pride and unpleasant boastfulness. See
boastful
More examplesFewer examplesArrogance and boastfulness are unattractive qualities.What once was seen as boastfulness now is viewed as charm.He has a reputation for boastfulness which is at odds with his limited achievements.
